name: Login via exchange
author: Daif Alotaibi.

sections.description:
This plugin allows you to integrate WordPress with Exchange web service quickly and easily.

Features

  • Use exchange web service
sections.installation:
1. Use the WordPress plugin directory to install the plugin or upload the directory login-via-exchange to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Update the settings to those that best match your environment by going to Settings -> login via exchange
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Use the WordPress plugin directory to install the plugin or upload the directory login-via-exchange to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Update the settings to those that best match your environment by going to Settings -> login via exchange
